item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (245 points | 52 comments)
2. Web Browser Engineering (437 points | 72 comments)
3. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (134 points | 36 comments)

6. Mothbox 4.0 (63 points | 7 comments)
7. Big Advance on Simple-Sounding Math Problem Was a Century in the Making (16 points | discuss)
8. Busy Status Bar (1290 points | 419 comments)
9. Apple announces new iPad mini geared towards Apple Intelligence (13 points | 5 comments)
10. 19th century lions preyed on humans and giraffes (43 points | 35 comments)
11. World conker champion found with steel chestnut, cleared of cheating (354 points | 495 comments)
12. Commonly used arm positions can overestimate blood pressure readings: study (302 points | 201 comments)
13. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (465 points | 166 comments)
14. Drawing Graphics on Apple Vision with the Metal Rendering API (93 points | 55 comments)
15. Gosub – An open-source browser engine (361 points | 153 comments)
16. The three-page paper that shook philosophy: Gettiers in software engineering (268 points | 182 comments)
17. Apple introduces new iPad mini built for Apple Intelligence (14 points | 4 comments)
18. Invisible text that AI chatbots understand and humans can't? (34 points | 17 comments)
19. Splitting engineering teams into defense and offense (157 points | 107 comments)
20. Show HN: X11 tool to share a screen area in any video meeting (309 points | 144 comments)
21. Extracting financial disclosure and police reports with OpenAI Structured Output (231 points | 78 comments)
22. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (224 points | 54 comments)
23. Cargo Airships Are Happening (145 points | 173 comments)
24. The Physics of Magic Windows (2021) (155 points | 7 comments)
25. Furilabs Linux Phone (170 points | 200 comments)
26. PayloadCMS: Open-Source, Fullstack Next.js Framework (190 points | 73 comments)
27. Play 3.0 mini – A lightweight, reliable, cost-efficient Multilingual TTS model (227 points | 75 comments)
28. Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) Basics (79 points | 18 comments)
29. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (547 points | 425 comments)
30. Routine dental X-rays are not backed by evidence (279 points | 292 comments)
